body_html:
I'm not sure when it changed, however this file already has this change

tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile

Line 69 in bc4101e

CMD ["/run_jupyter.sh", "--allow-root"]

Even if registry has new container that this one inherits FROM, CMD is being overridden so we need to change it here too.

Existing containers should be fine, if they worked they'll keep working.
body_text:

Even if registry has new container that this one inherits FROM, CMD is being overridden so we need to change it here too.
Existing containers should be fine, if they worked they'll keep working.
body:
I'm not sure when it changed, however this file already has this change https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/bc4101eb4d1d088faaadb68991e4c177bdf249bd/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile#L69

Even if registry has new container that this one inherits FROM, CMD is being overridden so we need to change it here too.

Existing containers should be fine, if they worked they'll keep working.
